subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Michel Bonnefous, general manager of the winning team during the last America’s Cup, discusses the present and future of the competition with Christoper Clarey of The New York Times.
snippet: Michel Bonnefous, general manager of the winning team during the last America’s Cup, discusses the present and future of the competition with Christoper Clarey of The New York Times.
